messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’ll beat you with the MAGIKARP my dad
gave me!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
But they’re Pokémon I got from my
dad...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Who gave you your first Pokémon?Your first Pokémon is the one with
the most fond memories, I think.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
This time, I’ll beat you with the
Pokémon my dad gave me!
